title: Pidcock ‘Frazzled’ By Transfer Rumors, Bahrain Victorious Snag France’s Best GC Hope
content:
A growing roar about a possible Pidcock transfer leaves the MTB gold medalist exasperated in explosive Olympic road race: 'I was mentally exhausted with the Olympics and everything else going on.'

Read the full article at Pidcock ‘Frazzled’ By Transfer Rumors, Bahrain Victorious Snag France’s Best GC Hope on Velo.
author: ahood
